name: Garden Beginnings
description: Learn the basics in a peaceful garden setting
author: Puzzle Team

intro.title: Welcome to the Garden
intro.content: You find yourself in a beautiful garden where everything seems slightly out of place. The flower tiles have been scattered by a gentle breeze. Can you help restore order to this peaceful sanctuary?

midpoint.title: Garden Wisdom
midpoint.content: As you progress through the garden, you notice that each solved puzzle reveals a hidden pattern in the flowers. The garden seems to be teaching you something about patience and careful observation.

completion.title: Garden Master
completion.content: The garden is now in perfect harmony! The flowers have taught you the fundamentals of spatial reasoning. You notice a path leading toward distant mountains, beckoning you to continue your journey.

puzzles.name: Morning Dew
puzzles.description: A simple arrangement to start your garden journey
puzzles.hintText: Start by moving tiles adjacent to the empty space. Try to get the 1 tile in the top-left corner first.

puzzles.name: Blooming Petals
puzzles.description: Arrange the flower petals in the correct order
puzzles.hintText: Focus on getting the top row correct first, then work on the middle row.

puzzles.name: Butterfly Dance
puzzles.description: Guide the butterflies to their favorite flowers
puzzles.hintText: Watch how the butterflies move - they prefer certain paths through the garden.

puzzles.name: Sunny Arrangement
puzzles.description: Organize the sunflowers to face the morning sun
puzzles.hintText: Sunflowers grow tall - try to arrange them from smallest to largest.

puzzles.name: Rose Garden
puzzles.description: Arrange the roses by color and bloom stage
puzzles.hintText: This larger grid requires more planning. Work on corners first, then edges.

puzzles.name: Herb Spiral
puzzles.description: Create a perfect spiral pattern with the herb tiles
puzzles.hintText: Think in spirals - start from the outside and work your way in.

puzzles.name: Secret Garden
puzzles.description: Unlock the hidden pattern in the enchanted garden
puzzles.hintText: Some tiles might have special relationships - look for hidden connections.

puzzles.name: Garden Symphony
puzzles.description: Arrange the musical flowers to create a harmonious melody
puzzles.hintText: Listen to the melody as you move tiles - harmony guides the way.

puzzles.name: Garden Mastery
puzzles.description: The ultimate test of your garden arrangement skills
puzzles.hintText: You've learned much in the garden. Trust your instincts and take your time.

bonusObjectives.name: Garden Guardian
bonusObjectives.description: Complete the entire level without restarting any puzzle

bonusObjectives.name: Speed Gardener
bonusObjectives.description: Complete this final puzzle in under 50 moves

achievements.name: Garden Beginner
achievements.description: Complete your first 3 puzzles in the garden

achievements.name: Green Thumb
achievements.description: Complete 6 puzzles in the garden level

achievements.name: Garden Perfectionist
achievements.description: Complete all puzzles with perfect efficiency

achievements.name: Flower Power
achievements.description: Complete the garden level in under 1 hour total

level2.description: Complete 6 puzzles to unlock the Mountain Peaks

screenReaderDescriptions.1: Three by three grid with flower pattern tiles numbered 1 through 8
screenReaderDescriptions.2: Colorful petal arrangement in three by three formation
screenReaderDescriptions.3: Butterfly and flower combination tiles in small grid
screenReaderDescriptions.4: Sunflower tiles arranged in three by three pattern
screenReaderDescriptions.5: Four by four grid with rose tiles in various bloom stages
screenReaderDescriptions.6: Herb spiral pattern in four by four arrangement
screenReaderDescriptions.7: Mystical flower tiles with hidden pattern indicators
screenReaderDescriptions.8: Musical note flower combination in four by four grid
screenReaderDescriptions.9: Premium garden arrangement in four by four master pattern
